pull_requests.title: feat: Add Google OAuth support for Gemini subscriptions
pull_requests.body:
Implements OAuth authentication for Google AI Pro/Ultra subscribers, allowing them to use their subscription credentials instead of API keys.

Changes:
- Add GooglePlugin to src/auth/plugins.ts with OAuth flow using official Gemini CLI OAuth credentials
- Add google provider loader in src/provider/provider.ts
- Create documentation in docs/google-oauth.md
- Add case study research in docs/case-studies/issue-66/
- Update check-file-size.mjs to exclude reference submodules

The OAuth flow uses:
- Standard authorization code flow with PKCE
- OAuth scopes: cloud-platform, userinfo.email, userinfo.profile
- Automatic token refresh with 5-minute buffer
- Bearer token authentication

To authenticate: agent auth google

Closes #66

pull_requests.title: Full support for Gemini oAuth (subscriptions login)
pull_requests.body:
This PR implements full OAuth support for Google AI Pro/Ultra subscriptions, replacing the deprecated out-of-band redirect method with a modern local server approach.

### Key Changes

1. **Updated Google OAuth Plugin** (`src/auth/plugins.ts`):
    - Replaced deprecated `urn:ietf:wg:oauth:2.0:oob` redirect with local HTTP server
    - Added automatic redirect handling for seamless user experience
    - Maintained PKCE and state validation for security
    - Added proper error handling and timeout management
2. **Enhanced OAuth Scopes**:
    - Added `generative-language.retriever` scope for full Gemini API access
    - Maintained existing scopes for cloud platform and user info
3. **Provider Integration** (`src/provider/provider.ts`):
    - Google provider now supports OAuth authentication via auth plugins
    - Automatic cost zeroing for subscription users
4. **Updated Documentation** (`docs/google-oauth.md`):
    - Comprehensive guide for OAuth setup
    - Troubleshooting section for common issues
    - Technical details about token storage and refresh

### Technical Implementation

- **OAuth Flow**: Authorization Code with PKCE using local server callback
- **Security**: State parameter validation and secure token storage
- **User Experience**: Browser opens automatically, closes on completion
- **Compatibility**: Maintains backward compatibility with API key authentication

### Testing

- OAuth flow tested with Google AI Pro/Ultra accounts
- Token refresh mechanism verified
- Error handling validated for network issues and timeouts

Closes #66
